name: GROOGLY
description:
GROOGLY

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Groogly is my very first project as a game developer and will only be the beginning of all my new creations and projects. The game itself is a simple 3 level adventure themed platformer with enemies and bosses to kill. Inside the game lies secrets, secrets that promote my future games with hidden information. If you're keen for groogly then lemme know with a thumbs up! Thanks for your time.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
